data.name: Gawr Gura: Quest for Bread
data.detailed_description:
All that for a loaf of bread?


After losing a baguette in her house, Gawr Gura and her time-traveling detective companion Amelia Watson leap back in time to find it. But things go wrong, as all time-travel stories do, leaving Gura alone in unfamiliar territory. Help Gura jump through levels and fight unique enemies in this interdimensional, time-traveling, action-platforming adventure!

Features


  • A comedic storyline featuring a cast of quirky, loveable characters
  • Fluid platforming mechanics that are fun to execute
  • Simple, fast-paced combat, with a myriad of enemies and a handful of bosses
  • Seven unique areas each with a colorful, unique visual style
  • Play hide and seek with a fish! Rescue some chickens! Fight a buff shrimp? Every area in the game its own set of inhabitants and quirks

This isn't a beach, this is a bathtub!

There are plenty of inside jokes and callbacks to past Hololive streams, but no knowledge of the streamers is needed to enjoy the game!

Notice: This is a fan game! I have no affiliation with Cover Corp or its talents.
All Hololive Talents © Cover Corp 2022

data.short_description: An interdimensional, time-traveling, action-platforming adventure game featuring everyone's favorite shark.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3-370M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3-370M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mesa Intel® UHD Graphics 620
